Models¶

class demo.models.Store(*args, **kwargs)¶

This class represents one store.

Parameters:
  • state (str) – The store state. Must be one the following: NY, NJ, CT, PA, MA
  • numOfEmployees (int) – The number of employees in the store
  • expenses (float) – The yearly expenses of the store
  • size (int) – The store size
class demo.models.Transaction(*args, **kwargs)¶

This class represents a transcation that occured in a store

Parameters:
  • date (datetime) – The transcation date
  • amount (float) – The transcation amount
  • store (Store) – The store where the transcation took place
